import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from './../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from './../components/sectionContainer'; class tenthForm extends Component { state = { earningsPerMonth: '', expenditurePerMonth:'', kprInstallments:'', typeOfWork:'', industrySector:'', byYear:'', byMonth:'', position:'', dependents:'', }; submitHandler = event => { console.log({...this.state}); axios({ method: 'POST', url: 'http://localhost:9090/application-form/received', contentType: "application/json", data: {...this.state}, //config: { headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json' }}} }) .then(function (response) { //handle success window.alert(response.data); //window.location.assign("http://localhost:3000/form11?ID="+response.data); }) .catch(function (response) { //handle error console.log(response); }); event.preventDefault(); event.target.className += ' was-validated'; }; changeHandler = event => { this.setState({ ...this.state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}); }; render() { return (
